page.title: 09CHILDRENS VIEWS
page.content:
RESULTS TAKEN FROM MIDDLE SCHOOL CLASS 1) What is your favourite lesson? Results. English 20% Maths 32% P.E.20% History 4% Writing 6% Playing 6% Reading 4% Don't know? 2) What is your favourite game? Sport 20% Chase 30% Board games 8% Party games 18% Anything 14% Dont know 10%.3) Do you go out after school? No 24% yes,to the park 38% yes to friends 12% yes in the streets 22% yes anywhere 4% 4) What time do you have to go in? Don't go out 22% don't know 28% 5.00 18% 6.00 10% 7.00 12% 8.00 4% anytime 6%. How much pocket money do you get? 0-50p 58% 50p-Â£1 24% over Â£1 4% none 14%. What music do you like ? pop 70% piano 6% theme tunes 4% dont know 12% none 8%. by Liane Crosby & Gillian Preston.
